meanings.definition: A type of edible sea snail found in New Zealand.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious dish made with paua for the first time.
meanings.sent2: The paua was a popular seafood choice among the locals.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the paua must have swum all the way to the plate.
meanings.sent4: The paua's journey from the ocean to the kitchen was like a culinary adventure.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the paua shell made it stand out on the beach.

meanings.definition: The iridescent shell of the paua snail, used in jewelry and decorative items.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful necklace adorned with paua shells.
meanings.sent2: The shop displayed a variety of paua shell products.
meanings.sent3: The children collected paua shells to create their own shiny treasures.
meanings.sent4: The paua shell reflected the sunlight like a miniature rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The jewelry made from paua shells sparkled like stars in the night sky.
